amendment.description: To provide, with an offset, additional amounts for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, for funding for Wideband Digital Airbourne Electronic Sensing Array.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4469 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4469 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed. (consideration: CR S6346-6366) To provide, with an offset, additional amounts for Research, Development, Test, and Evaluation, Air Force, for funding for Wideband Digital Airbourne Electronic Sensing Array.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4469 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4469 proposed by Senator Levin for Senator Reed.
